channel.title: [317] pvp areas [317]
channel.description: Hi i want to make the whole of runescape a pvp area except for the camelot castle... how would i go about that? rep++

item.title: [317] pvp areas [317]
item.dc:creator: @Usagi Usagi
item.description:
@Usagi wrote:

[font=courier]Follow the FunPK guide and engineer it to your liking. I set it to check for a variable that is true or false depending on the player typing the command ::worldpvp which switched it on/off basically your code would look something like this

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
		if (Type == 1) {
			if (coordX >= Coordinates where the camelot castle is, more complicated then I am making it)) {
				return false;
			}
		} else if (Type == 2) {
			if ((coordY >= same shit here)
					&& (coordX >= 2942)) {
				return false;
			}
		}
		return true;
		}

[font=courier]Not really simple but if you get the concept its possible. I’m sure there is an easier way but this is the method I would use.[/font]

Read full topic
